name: Golden Legion's Stayed Blade
text: When you’re dealing with large and secretive organizations, a dead enemy is just a corpse, but a captured enemy can be a tool.
benefit: If you deal an amount of damage to a creature that would slay it outright, you can pull that attack, instead dealing only enough damage to reduce its hit points to –1, and leave it stable.
text_zh: 当你面对庞大而神秘的组织时，死掉的敌人不过是具尸体，而活捉的敌人则是可用的工具。
benefit_zh: 如果你造成了能杀死目标的伤害，你能选择只造成刚好使其HP到达-1并且稳定伤势的伤害。
